deseja.name: Dark
deseja.summary: Viagem no tempo e mistérios em uma cidade alemã.

deseja.name: The Boys
deseja.summary: Super-heróis fora de controle enfrentam justiça brutal.

deseja.name: Match nas Estrelas
deseja.summary: Match nas Estrelas is an astrological dating show. There are twelve episodes in which a single person, who represents one of the zodiac signs, is introduced to four bachelors or bachelorettes with whom they have different astral compatibilities. Chatting and chemistry: everything can be a sign of what the stars want. After the dates, it's time to make a decision: listen to or ignore the stars?

deseja.name: Dexter
deseja.summary: He's smart, he's good looking, and he's got a great sense of humor. He's Dexter Morgan, everyone's favorite serial killer. As a Miami forensics expert, he spends his days solving crimes, and nights committing them. But Dexter lives by a strict code of honor that is both his saving grace and lifelong burden. Torn between his deadly compulsion and his desire for true happiness, Dexter is a man in profound conflict with the world and himself.

favoritos.name: Breaking Bad
favoritos.summary: Um professor de química se torna traficante.

favoritos.name: Dexter
favoritos.summary: He's smart, he's good looking, and he's got a great sense of humor. He's Dexter Morgan, everyone's favorite serial killer. As a Miami forensics expert, he spends his days solving crimes, and nights committing them. But Dexter lives by a strict code of honor that is both his saving grace and lifelong burden. Torn between his deadly compulsion and his desire for true happiness, Dexter is a man in profound conflict with the world and himself.

favoritos.name: Batman
favoritos.summary: Wealthy entrepreneur Bruce Wayne and his ward Dick Grayson lead a double life: they are actually crime fighting duo Batman and Robin. A secret Batpole in the Wayne mansion leads to the Batcave, where Police Commissioner Gordon often calls with the latest emergency threatening Gotham City. Racing to the scene of the crime in the Batmobile, Batman and Robin must (with the help of their trusty Bat-utility-belt) thwart the efforts of a variety of master criminals, including Catwoman, Egghead, The Joker, King Tut, The Penguin, and The Riddler.

favoritos.name: Amores que Engañan
favoritos.summary: An anthology series featuring the stories of women who confront everyday relationships and modern hardships from domestic violence and heartbreak to mental illness and infertility.

assistidas.name: The Office
assistidas.summary: O cotidiano de um escritório da Dunder Mifflin.
